paper_metadata.title: The Role of Women Entrepreneurs in Poverty Alleviation in Gusau Metropolis

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: The research found that women entrepreneurs play a key role in poverty alleviation in Gusau metropolis through income generation and job creation
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: Data were collected from the primary source, using a questionnaire on a sample of 354 selected women entrepreneurs. A stratified sample method was used

evidence_citations.country_citation: Women in the developing countries like Nigeria are facing the problem of gender discrimination
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: Data were collected from the primary source, using a questionnaire on a sample of 354 selected women entrepreneurs
